description: This file `omi_proxy.hpp` declares the `OmiProxy` class within the `omi` namespace, implementing the `IOmiProxy` interface. It provides method declarations related to mounting, unmounting crypted bundles, and listener registration. It also includes license and header guards.

classes.name: omi::OmiProxy
classes.description: A concrete class implementing the IOmiProxy interface for managing crypted bundles and event listeners.

methods.name: bool mountCryptedBundle(const std::string & id,const std::string & rootfs_file_path,const std::string & config_json_path,std::string & bundlePath)
methods.description: Mounts a crypted bundle given its ID, filesystem path, JSON config, and outputs the bundle path. Currently stubbed to always return true.

methods.name: bool umountCryptedBundle(const std::string & id)
methods.description: Unmounts a crypted bundle identified by its ID. Stubbed to always return true.

methods.name: long unsigned registerListener(const OmiErrorListener & listener,const void * cbParams)
methods.description: Registers an OmiErrorListener callback, returning a handle (tag). Stub implementation returns 0.

methods.name: void unregisterListener(long unsigned tag)
methods.description: Unregisters a listener based on its tag.

ctags.name: mountCryptedBundle
ctags.signature: (const std::string & id,const std::string & rootfs_file_path,const std::string & config_json_path,std::string & bundlePath)

ctags.name: registerListener
ctags.pattern: /^    virtual long unsigned registerListener(const OmiErrorListener &listener, const void* cbParam/

ctags.name: umountCryptedBundle
ctags.pattern: /^    virtual bool umountCryptedBundle(const std::string& id) { return true; }$/
